author: Rebecca Shapiro
title: Fan Watching 'This Is Us' Interrupted By Milo Ventimiglia Knocking On His Door
text:
Fan Watching 'This Is Us' Interrupted By Milo Ventimiglia Knocking On His Door The actor noticed a neighbor watching the very show he stars in. 02/08/2017 01:57 am ET | Updated 48 minutes ago Rebecca Shapiro Senior Editor, The Huffington Post 
Milo Ventimiglia was filming the NBC hit show, ‚ÄúThis Is Us‚Äù when he noticed a person in a nearby house watching television. What was on screen? The very show Ventimiglia was filming. 
So he decided to knock on the door. When your filming #ThisIsUs & the neighbors are watching... #ThisIsUs while you're filming #ThisIsUs !!! TONIGHT we're back!! 9/8c on @nbc MV pic.twitter.com/XPixJS1j8J ‚Äî Milo Ventimiglia (@MiloVentimiglia) February 7, 2017 
‚ÄúHi, sorry to bother you,‚Äù Ventimiglia said as the door opened. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre filming next door, but we happened to notice what you‚Äôre watching right now.‚Äù 
The man, who said his name was Fred, began laughing. 
‚ÄúYes, I‚Äôm watching you guys!‚Äù 
‚ÄúSo we‚Äôre filming this right next door!‚Äù Ventimiglia said. Additional members of the cast and crew joined in laughing as Fred took out his camera to take photos. 
The video has since gone viral ‚Äï shared by more than 2,000 Twitter users and liked more than 9,000 times. @MiloVentimiglia how sweet...and a little creepy! üòÇ
